experiments.title: Shell Scripting Experiment 1
experiments.result: A bash script for displaying processor information was executed and verified.

experiments.title: Shell Scripting Experiment 2
experiments.result: A bash script for displaying memory information was executed and verified.

experiments.title: Shell Scripting Experiment 3
experiments.result: A bash script for a scientific calculator was executed and verified.

experiments.title: Shell Scripting Experiment 4
experiments.result: A bash script to print prime numbers in a given range was executed and verified.

experiments.title: Shell Scripting Experiment 5
experiments.result: A menu-driven bash script for number conversion was executed and verified.

experiments.title: Shell Scripting Experiment 6
experiments.result: A bash script for removing occurrences of a word beyond N times was executed and verified.

experiments.title: Shell Scripting Experiment 7
experiments.result: A bash script implementing student record management was executed and verified.

experiments.title: Shell Scripting Experiment 8
experiments.result: A bash script for displaying process information was executed and verified.

experiments.title: Process Management System Calls - 01
experiments.result: C program demonstrating the use of fork system call was executed and verified.

experiments.title: Process Management System Calls - 02
experiments.result: C program to display odd and even numbers from input using processes was executed and verified.

experiments.title: CPU Scheduling Algorithms
experiments.result: C program simulating various scheduling algorithms on a process mix was executed and verified.

experiments.title: Banker's Algorithm
experiments.result: C program simulating banker's algorithm on a process mix was executed and verified.

experiments.title: Page Replacement Algorithms
experiments.result: C program simulating various paging algorithms was executed and verified.

experiments.title: Memory Allocation Methods
experiments.result: C program to implement memory allocation methods was executed and verified.

experiments.title: Familiarization of I/O System Calls
experiments.result: C program to list files and directories in a given path was executed and verified.

experiments.title: Disk Scheduling Algorithms
experiments.result: C program to simulate various disk-scheduling algorithms was executed and verified.

experiments.title: Resource Usage System Calls
experiments.result: C program to display the system date and time as well as time spent by the process in user and kernel mode was executed and verified.

experiments.title: Multithreaded Calculation of Measures of Central Tendencies
experiments.result: C program to calculate the mean, median, and standard deviation for a list of integers in different threads was executed and verified.

experiments.title: IPC Using Shared Memory
experiments.result: C program to determine time taken by a process to execute a given command was executed and verified.

experiments.title: Multiprocessing System Calls
experiments.result: C program to demonstrate the use of execvp system call was executed and verified.

experiments.title: Process Synchronization to Solve TA Problem Using Semaphores
experiments.result: C program to solve the TA problem was executed and verified.

experiments.title: Process Synchronization to Solve Dining Philosophers Problem Using Semaphores
experiments.result: C program to solve the dining philosophers problem using semaphores was executed and verified.

experiments.title: Address Translation
experiments.result: C program to simulate the address translation in the paging scheme was executed and verified.
